channel.title: How to add a teleport if you click an emote
channel.description:
I need to make it so when you click yes you are teleported somewhere, this is how far i've gotten, I have went into clickingmost.java nad found the right emote, then I've renamed it, then I tried something like this,
[code=cpp] case 168: // Ivone emote triggerTele(3555, 9862, 0);[/code]
That does not work,
If you can help me with that that would be great,
Bonus!
How do I make it so only admin+ can go there ?
Thanks to anyone that can help in anyways :)

item.title: How to add a teleport if you click an emote
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[code=java]
/**

  • If you click the ivone emote and you are admin+, tele to x - 3555, y - 9862 height - 0.
    */
    case 168: // if case 168 clicked (Ivone emote)
    if(c.playerRights >= 2){ // if admin+
    c.triggerTele(3555, 9862, 0); // teleport
    } // close admin+ condition
    break; // close case
    // Usman wrote this.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a teleport if you click an emote
